select * from pointlog as p inner join users as u on p.uno = u.uno;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pointlog (point_indecrease, free_paid, point_reason, uno) VALUES (#{point_indecrease}, #{free_paid}, #{point_reason}, #{uno})
mapper.select: select * from inventory as i inner join product as p on i.product_no = p.product_no;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inventory (inventory_indecrease, inventory_reason, product_no) VALUES (#{inventory_indecrease}, #{inventory_reason}, #{product_no});
mapper.select: SELECT i.product_no, p.product_name, SUM(i.inventory_indecrease) AS product_count FROM inventory i INNER JOIN product p ON i.product_no = p.product_no GROUP BY i.product_no;
SELECT * FROM orders AS o INNER JOIN odetails AS od ON o.order_no = od.order_no INNER JOIN product AS p ON od.product_no = p.product_no INNER JOIN users AS u ON o.uno = u.uno;
